x = {}   # x is an object
with x
	y = 1		# We declare the member x.y
	readonly y	# and make the member y readonly
end
x['y'] = 1      # accessing y should fail
===
{{
x = {}   # x is an object
with x
	y = 1		# We declare the member x.y
	readonly y	# and make the member y readonly
end
x['y'] = 1      # accessing y should fail
}}
